author: ET Online
title: Day 2 of lockdown: Sitharaman announces new relief measures as covid cases spike
description: After first easing tax deadlines and business regulations, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced a Rs 1.7 lakh crore relief package for the poor today. India's case count spiked to 650, with 13 casualties being reported so far.
content:
After first easing tax deadlines and business regulations, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced a Rs 1.7 lakh crore relief package for the poor today.
India's case count spiked to 650, with 13 casualties being reported so far.
